item.title: Etihad and Fiji Airways establish codeshare partnership
item.description:
Fiji Airways and Etihad Airways, the national airline of the United Arab Emirates, have established an interline agreement. This partnership enables both airlines to sell tickets to and from a wider range of destinations. Passengers can now travel between 17 cities in the Middle East, 29 cities in Asia, and three cities in Australia to and from Fiji, along with other destinations. James Hogan, President and CEO of Etihad Airways, expressed enthusiasm for the partnership, stating that Fiji is an excellent vacation destination and enhances Etihad’s global network...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-and-fiji-airways-establish-codeshare-partnership/
